title: ERC721 function _transfer, only allows owner
body:
<!-- Briefly describe the issue you're experiencing. Tell us what you were trying to do and what happened instead. -->
I'm trying to use the `approve` method to allow addressB to send on my behalf. This is works, but when I switch to addressB and `safeTransferFrom`, I get `ERC721: transfer of token that is not own`

`safeTransferFrom` checks `_isApprovedOrOwner` first which makes sense. Either owner or approved can transfer. https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/01f2ff1ba1220d7d3a0642014d30543bfcbb41ee/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#L183

But when it calls `_transfer`, the require is more strict. It only allows the owner, hence the bug. https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/01f2ff1ba1220d7d3a0642014d30543bfcbb41ee/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#L334

Is this intended?
